text: Yisakalaka ta'oraatara dayitbabhara diya haichila, kintu sihamte iyaka bahana karaa nachila. Sihamtara udaharana haiche- gadhara darae! Yiye bahu kitapara boja bahana karae. Kimana ye nikrsta se'i sampradayara drstanta yihamte allahara ayatasamuhaka micha buli aman'ya karae; arau allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae
